scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages crafted inputs and observes the model's outputs to infer protected attributes like income and age.
initial_goal: Develop a system to identify customers likely to churn within the next quarter based on publicly available data.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A customer churn prediction model deployed to predict which banking customers are likely to switch to a competitor within the next quarter.  The model is trained on a dataset containing sensitive customer information such as income, age, location and transaction history.
